wsit:service

Full name:

com.github.wsitbt:wsit-maven-plugin:1.0.8-SNAPSHOT:service

Description:

Generates wsit service configuration files.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 1.0.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-resources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
bindingpolicy String 1.0 The id of a Policy in the Policy fragment to apply to the binding. This should be a policy that defines the security requirements of the service.
classname String 1.0 The full name (including the package) of the web service implementation class.
outputdir File 1.0 The configuration files will be written to this directory.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/resources.
policy File 1.0 The policy fragment with WSIT configuration to apply.
wsdl File 1.0 The service's WSDL.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
faultpolicy String 1.0 Specifies a policy to apply to all fault operations
inputpolicy String 1.0 Specifies a policy to apply to all input operations
outputpolicy String 1.0 Specifies a policy to apply to all output operations
updatewsdl boolean 1.0 Updates the wsdl with the policy. This removes any WSIT specific configuration from the policy and applies the policy to the wsdl.
Default value is: false.
wsdloutdir File 1.0 The output folder for the wsdl. Defaults to the outputdir.

Parameter Details

bindingpolicy:

The id of a Policy in the Policy fragment to apply to the binding. This should be a policy that defines the security requirements of the service.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: wsit-service.bindingpolicy

classname:

The full name (including the package) of the web service implementation class.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: wsit-service.classname

faultpolicy:

Specifies a policy to apply to all fault operations
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: wsit-service.outputpolicy

inputpolicy:

Specifies a policy to apply to all input operations
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: wsit-service.inputpolicy

outputdir:

The configuration files will be written to this directory.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: wsit-service.outputdir
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/resources

outputpolicy:

Specifies a policy to apply to all output operations
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: wsit-service.outputpolicy

policy:

The policy fragment with WSIT configuration to apply.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: wsit-service.policy

updatewsdl:

Updates the wsdl with the policy. This removes any WSIT specific configuration from the policy and applies the policy to the wsdl.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: wsit-service.updatewsdl
  • Default: false

wsdl:

The service's WSDL.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: wsit-service.wsdl

wsdloutdir:

The output folder for the wsdl. Defaults to the outputdir.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: wsit-service.wsdloutdir
